meanings.definition: Resembling sapphire in color or brilliance.
meanings.sent1: The sapphirine dress sparkled under the lights.
meanings.sent2: Her eyes had a sapphirine hue that mesmerized everyone.
meanings.sent3: The sapphirine sky made the day feel magical.
meanings.sent4: The lake reflected the sapphirine sky like a mirror.
meanings.sent5: The sapphirine gemstone was the most beautiful she had ever seen.

meanings.definition: A mineral that is blue in color and belongs to the pyroxene group.
meanings.sent1: The geologist found a rare sapphirine in the rock formation.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed a collection of sapphirines from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The sapphirine was so precious that it was kept under lock and key.
meanings.sent4: The sapphirine mineral gleamed like a hidden treasure.
meanings.sent5: The sapphirine was the prized possession of the mineral collector.

meanings.sent1: The artist mixed different shades to create a perfect sapphirine.
meanings.sent2: The ocean had a sapphirine tint that stretched as far as the eye could see.
meanings.sent3: The sapphirine of the night sky was breathtakingly beautiful.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was the exact shade of sapphirine as the summer sky.
